			 Our Projects 
			 CLICK A PROJECT BELOW TO LEARN MORE 		
			 Pelotonâ€™s exploration portfolio includes the North Elko Lithium Project (lithium, uranium, molybdenum and gold), as well Independence Valley, a gold project on the Carlin Trend, Nevada, and a non-controlling interest in a copper porphyry project near Butte, Montana. 
 Peloton builds shareholder value by acquiring exceptional exploration prospects and enhancing those prospects through managerial experience and technical expertise.
